name: Bubble Witch
summary: Will you become the fourth witch in the circle? Burst bubbles, create spiders and fill the cauldrons! If you are good enough, you will become a true witch with all the benefits that include. The house is spooky, and the cauldrons are full of pretty disgusting things, but nothing beats being part of a successful circle!
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 益智
  • 游玩人数: 单人
  • 官方网站: http://www.king.com/games/puzzle-games/bubble-witch
